scripts.build:server-dev: npm run clean:server-dev && cross-env APP_TARGET=server NODE_ENV=development node config/scripts/build-server
scripts.build:server-prod: npm run clean:server-prod && cross-env APP_TARGET=server NODE_ENV=production node config/scripts/build-server && rimraf build/static/bundle.css build/static/bundle.css.map
scripts.build:client-prod: npm run clean:prod && mkdirp build && ncp src/favicon.ico build/favicon.ico && cross-env APP_TARGET=client NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:client-prod && npm run build:server-prod
scripts.clean: npm run clean:server-dev && npm run clean:prod
scripts.dev: npm run build:server-dev && cross-env APP_TARGET=server NODE_ENV=development node src/server.js
scripts.prod: npm run build:prod && cd build && cross-env APP_TARGET=server NODE_ENV=production node server.js
